pullRequest.title: Adding support for JDBC
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Initial code of JDBC driver
Uses native java client to execute queries

nodes.bodyText: Any reason why this has to use pinot.client.ResultSet (which seems like a really old class). We have ResultTable used for returning responses that is a more recent code, you may want to check it out.
_queryFormat can be a static final, instead of initializing in constructor?
Does it make sense to make it case insensitive check?

nodes.bodyText: what should this return according to the spec
+1, lets use resultTable. Its ok to say we support jdbc only on SQL endpoint
can we create AbstractBaseResultSet and implement all unsupported exceptions in that class. this will improve readability in this class

beforeCommit.message: adding unit tests for prepared statements

commit.message: implementing various data types for ResultSet
moving unsupported and overloaded functions to abstract class
adding unit tests for result set
bug fix and unit tests for result set
adding prepared statement and fix license headers
adding unit tests for prepared statements
moving default methods to abstract class
adding support for fetching column data type
